TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider extends System.Web.Security.RoleProvider

summary.span: 在 XML 文件中、Active Directory 中或 Active Directory 应用程序模式服务器上管理 ASP.NET 应用程序的角色成员资格信息在授权管理器策略存储区中的存储。

span.span: Manages storage of role-membership information for an ASP.NET application in an authorization-manager policy store, either in an XML file, in an Active Directory, or on an Active Directory Application Mode server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和类使用此类为使用授权管理器存储的 ASP.NET 应用程序提供角色管理服务。This class is used by the and classes to provide role-management services for an ASP.NET application using an authorization-manager store. 你可以使用角色管理为应用程序指定不同的授权级别。You can use role management to specify different levels of authorization for your application. 可以使用 Microsoft 管理控制台访问授权管理器。The authorization manager can be accessed using the Microsoft Management Console. 对象同时适用于 Windows 身份验证和窗体身份验证模式。The object works with both Windows authentication and forms authentication modes. 可以将对象配置为使用本地 XML 文件或 Active Directory 或 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) 服务器。You can configure the object to use either a local XML file or an Active Directory or Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server. 使用本地文件时, 连接字符串应类似于下面的示例。When using a local file, the connection string should look like the following example. ``` msxml:// ``` 如果本地文件存储在 ASP.NET Web 应用程序的目录树中, 则可以使用波形符 ("~") 字符来表示根目录。If the local file is stored in the directory tree of an ASP.NET Web application, you can use the tilde ("~") character to indicate the root directory. 例如, 若要指示本地文件存储在 Web 应用程序的数据目录中, 可以使用类似于以下示例的连接字符串。For example, to indicate that the local file is stored in the Web application's data directory, you would use a connection string similar to the following example. `msxml://~\App_Data\datafilename.xml` > [!IMPORTANT] > 将 XML 数据文件存储在 Web 应用程序目录中是潜在的安全威胁。Storing an XML data file in the Web application directory is a potential security threat. 默认情况下, IIS 将向 Web 提供 XML 数据文件。By default, IIS will serve XML data files to the Web. 若要在 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用本地数据文件时提高安全性, 应将数据文件存储在`App_Data`目录中。To improve security when using a local data file in an ASP.NET application, you should store the data file in the `App_Data` directory. 存储在`App_Data`目录中的文件不会提供给 Web。Files stored in the `App_Data` directory will not be served to the Web. 如果对策略存储使用 Active Directory 或 ADAM 服务器, 则连接字符串应类似于以下示例。If you are using an Active Directory or ADAM server for the policy store, your connection string should be similar to the following example. `msldap://myserver/CN=MyAzManStore,OU=MyOU,DC=MyDomain,DC=MyDC,DC=Com` 对象方法的文档中列出的异常是由对象引发的异常。The exceptions listed in the documentation for object methods are the exceptions that are raised by the object. 由于提供程序依赖于基础身份验证管理器运行时 , 因此只要对象将方法调用转发到身份验证管理器运行时, 就会引发异常。Since the provider relies on the underlying Authentication Manager runtime, a exception may be thrown whenever the object forwards a method call to the Authentication Manager runtime. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对象具有在部分信任环境中运行的以下要求:The object has the following requirements for running in partial-trust environments: > > 在 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用基于文件的策略存储时, 由当前信任级别授予的文件 i/o 权限决定了提供程序是否允许读取和写入操作。When using a file-based policy store in an ASP.NET application, the file I/O permissions granted by the current trust level determine whether read and write actions are allowed by the provider. ASP.NET 应用程序必须对文件具有读取权限才能从策略存储区中读取数据, 并且必须具有写入权限才能保存新信息或更新策略存储中的现有信息。The ASP.NET application must have read permission on the file to read data from the policy store, and must have write permission to save new information or update existing information in the policy store. 默认的中等信任策略文件在其应用程序目录中提供 ASP.NET 应用程序的读/写权限。The default Medium-trust policy file gives an ASP.NET application read/write permissions in its application directory. 默认的低信任策略文件仅在其应用程序目录中提供 ASP.NET 应用程序 read 权限。The default Low-trust policy file only gives an ASP.NET application read permission in its application directory. 此外, ASP.NET 应用程序运行时所用的进程标识必须具有读取和/或写入策略文件的文件系统权限。In addition, the process identity under which the ASP.NET application runs must have file-system permissions to read and/or write the policy file. > > 使用 Active Directory 或 ADAM 服务器时, ASP.NET 应用程序需要非托管代码权限, 因为内部对象代码使用 COM 互操作。When using an Active Directory or ADAM server, the ASP.NET application needs unmanaged-code permission because the internal object code uses COM interop. > > 在 ASP.NET 之外使用对象时, 调用代码需要非托管代码权限。When using the object outside of ASP.NET, the calling code needs unmanaged-code permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个设置为用于角色管理的 web.config 文件。The following code example shows a Web.config file set to use the for role management. ``` ```

related.span: 了解 ASP.NET 角色管理

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类调用, 以将一个或多个用户与在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的授权管理器数据存储区中的一个或多个角色相关联。The method is called by the class to associate one or more users with one or more roles in the authorization-manager data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 此方法由类的、 、 和方法调用。This method is called by the , , , and methods of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个或多个用户添加到角色或从角色中删除用户。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/adduserstorolecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/adduserstorolevb.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要存储和检索其角色信息的授权存储应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the authorization store application for which to store and retrieve role information.

value.span: 要存储和检索其角色信息的授权存储应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the authorization store application for which to store and retrieve role information.

value.span: 默认值为当前 的 属性值。

span.span: The default is the property value for the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用可将用户和角色与不同的授权管理器应用程序关联, 使多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以使用相同的授权管理器策略存储区来存储角色信息, 而无需重复角色名称之间的冲突。The is used by the to associate users and roles with different authorization-manager applications, which enables multiple ASP.NET applications to use the same authorization-manager policy store to store role information without running into conflicts between duplicate role names. 另外, 多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过在属性中指定相同的值, 来使用相同的策略存储。Alternatively, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same policy store by specifying the same value in the property. 可以通过编程方式设置该属性, 也可以通过`applicationName`使用属性以声明方式在应用程序的 web.config 文件中对其进行设置。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the application's Web.config file by using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果没有为 web.config 文件中的`applicationName`特性指定值, 则使用当前对象的属性值。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the Web.config file, then the property value for the current object is used. > [!NOTE] > 授权管理器应用程序名称不能包含属性中包含的 "/" 字符。Authorization-manager application names cannot contain the "/" character that is included in the property. 因此, 属性的默认值不能用作授权管理器应用程序名称, 并且在应用程序的 web.config 文件中, 必须始终在`provider`元素中`applicationName`指定要配置的属性你的实例。As a result, the default value for the property cannot be used as an authorization-manager application name, and in the application's Web.config file, you must always specify an `applicationName` attribute in the `provider` element to configure your instance. > [!CAUTION] > 由于单个默认角色提供程序实例用于对象所提供的所有请求, 因此您可以同时执行多个请求并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 对于多个写入, 属性不是线程安全的,当有多个应用程序用户时,更改属性值可能导致意外的行为。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior when there are multiple users of an application. 建议你避免编写允许用户设置属性的代码, 除非你必须这样做。We recommend that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you must. 可能需要设置属性的应用程序的一个示例是管理多个应用程序的角色数据的管理应用程序。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序, 而不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 ASP.NET 应用程序的`system.web` web.config 文件的节中的元素。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序的实例, 并将属性设置`MyApplication`为。It specifies the application's instance and sets the property to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类调用, 以在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的授权管理器数据存储区中创建角色。The method is called by the class to create a role in the authorization-manager data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 角色名称不区分大小写。Role names are not case sensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在授权管理器策略存储区中创建一个新角色。The following code example creates a new role in the authorization-manager policy store. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/createrolecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/createrolevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类调用方法, 以从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的授权管理器策略存储区中删除角色。 The method is called by the class to delete a role from the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 删除角色时, 也会从策略存储中删除与该角色关联的用户的列表。When a role is deleted, the list of users associated with that role is also deleted from the policy store. 数据库中的用户信息不受影响。The user information in the database is not affected. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole` `roleName`为`true`, 则将引发异常, 并且如果由参数标识的角色具有一个或多个成员, 则不会删除该角色。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `true`, then an exception will be thrown and the role will not be deleted if the role identified by the `roleName` parameter has one or more members. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole` 为`false`, 则无论角色是否为空, 都将被删除。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `false`, then the role will be deleted whether it is empty or not. ## Examples 下面的示例从授权管理器策略存储区中删除角色。The following example deletes a role from the authorization-manager policy store. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/deleterolecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/deleterolevb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类调用方法来检索在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的授权管理器策略存储区中的所有角色的列表。 The method is called by the class to retrieve a list of all the roles in the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法获取应用程序的角色列表, 并将结果绑定到控件。The following code example uses the method to get the list of roles for an application and bind the results to a control. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 类调用方法, 以从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的授权管理器策略存储区中检索指定用户的角色的列表。 The method is called by the class to retrieve a list of a specified user's roles from the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法检索指定用户的角色列表, 并将其绑定到控件。The following code example uses the method to retrieve a list of roles for a specified user and binds them to a control. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/ViewRolescs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/ViewRolesvb.aspx#4)]

exception.span: 服务器上没有安装身份验证管理器运行时。

span.span: The authorization-manager runtime is not installed on the server.

exception.span: 特性引用了一个指向不存在的文件的连接字符串。

span.span: The attribute references a connection string to a file that does not exist.

exception.span: 实例使用基于文件的策略存储进行配置，且当前的信任级别不允许对文件进行读访问。

span.span: The instance is configured with a file-based policy store, and read access to the file is not allowed at the current trust level.

related.span: 了解 ASP.NET 角色管理

param.name: roleName
param.span: 一个角色名称，将获取该角色的用户列表。

span.span: The name of the role to get the list of users for.

summary.span: 获取属于指定角色的用户的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of users in the specified role.

returns.span: 一个字符串数组，其中包含指定角色拥有的所有成员的用户名。

span.span: A string array containing the names of all the users who are members of the specified role.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类调用, 以检索与在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的授权管理器策略存储区中的指定角色关联的用户列表。The method is called by the class to retrieve the list of users associated with the specified role in the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 方法只返回直接包含在`roleName`参数指定的授权管理器角色中的用户名。 The method only returns user names that are directly contained in the authorization-manager role specified by the `roleName` parameter. 方法调用的基础授权管理器 API 不支持组扩展, 因此, 不会返回嵌套 NT 组中包含的用户、嵌套的授权管理器组和 LDAP 查询组。The underlying authorization-manager API called by the method does not support group expansion, so users contained in nested NT groups, nested authorization-manager groups, and LDAP query groups will not be returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法获取特定角色中的用户列表, 并将结果绑定到控件。The following code example uses the method to get a list of the users in a particular role and bind the results to a control. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/adduserstorolecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/adduserstorolevb.aspx#3)]

exception.span: 服务器上没有安装身份验证管理器运行时。

span.span: The authorization-manager runtime is not installed on the server.

exception.span: 特性引用了一个指向不存在的文件的连接字符串。

span.span: The attribute references a connection string to a file that does not exist.

exception.span: 实例使用基于文件的策略存储进行配置，且当前的信任级别不允许对文件进行读访问。

span.span: The instance is configured with a file-based policy store, and read access to the file is not allowed at the current trust level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 ASP.NET 应用程序配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的属性值初始化, 不应在代码中直接使用。The method initializes the with the property values specified in the ASP.NET application configuration file (Web.config) and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类和属性的方法调用, 以确定用户是否与 ASP.NET 应用程序中指定的授权管理器数据存储区中的角色关联配置文件 (web.config)。The method is called by the class and the method of the property to determine whether a user is associated with a role in the authorization-manager data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下面的代码示例以编程方式进行检查, 以查看登录的用户是否属于管理员角色, 然后才允许用户查看用户角色。The following code example programmatically checks to see whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view user roles. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/ViewRolescs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/ViewRolesvb.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类调用, 以从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的授权管理器策略存储区中的一个或多个角色中删除一个或多个用户。The method is called by the class to remove one or more users from one or more roles in the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 此方法由类的、 、 和方法调用。This method is called by the , , , and methods of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个或多个用户添加到角色或从角色中删除用户。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/adduserstorolecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/adduserstorolevb.aspx#3)]

span.span: One of the specified user names is .
One of the specified role names is .

exception.span: 指定的用户名之一为空字符串或是包含一个逗号。

span.span: One of the specified user names is an empty string or contains a comma.

exception.span: 指定的角色名之一为空字符串或是包含一个逗号。

span.span: One of the specified role names is an empty string or contains a comma.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类调用, 以确定在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的授权管理器数据存储区中是否存在角色名称。The method is called by the class to determine whether a role name exists in the authorization-manager data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来确定角色名称是否已存在, 然后再创建角色。The following code example uses the method to determine whether a role name already exists before creating the role. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/createrolecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/createrolevb.aspx#1)]

.property instance string ScopeName
Public Property ScopeName As String
public: property System::String ^ ScopeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ScopeName : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置授权存储区的范围名。

span.span: Gets or sets the scope name for the authorization store.
The scope name for the authorization store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用配置节的`providers`部分中`scopeName`提供程序实例的配置属性设置属性。The property can be set using the `scopeName` configuration attribute for the provider instance in the `providers` section of the configuration section. > [!CAUTION] > 由于单个默认角色提供程序实例用于对象所提供的所有请求, 因此您可以同时执行多个请求并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 对于多个写入, 属性不是线程安全的,当有多个应用程序用户时,更改属性值可能导致意外的行为。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior when there are multiple users of an application. 建议你避免编写允许用户设置属性的代码, 除非你必须这样做。We recommend that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you must. 可能需要设置属性的应用程序的一个示例是管理多个应用程序的角色数据的管理应用程序。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序, 而不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.

related.span: 了解 ASP.NET 角色管理
